info.description: Comprehensive REST API for managing game server infrastructure with panel integration, async job queue management, and real-time sync operations
info.title: NodeByte API

get.description: Returns all configuration from Config table and Discord webhooks

put.description: Clears sensitive API keys and tokens

post.description: Updates configuration in Config table and handles GitHub repos merging

get.description: Returns list of tracked GitHub repositories

post.description: Adds a new repository to track
Tests connection to Pterodactyl, Virtfusion, or Database

parameters.description: Connection type: pterodactyl, virtfusion, or database
parameters.name: type

get.description: Returns list of configured Discord webhooks

post.description: Creates a new Discord webhook for notifications

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive statistics for admin dashboard
Retrieves current sync status and recent stats

post.description: Triggers a synchronization operation with specified type
Requests cancellation of the currently running sync operation

get.description: Retrieves paginated sync operation logs with full details

post.description: Updates sync automation settings (enabled status and interval)

get.description: Retrieves counts of all manageable resources for the panel (no authentication required)
Retrieves publicly available system statistics (no authentication required)

post.description: Queues an email message for asynchronous sending

get.description: Retrieves aggregate statistics for all resources in the system
Retrieves server count statistics grouped by status and node
Retrieves user statistics including active, migrated, and admin counts

post.description: Requests cancellation of a running sync by ID
Initiates a complete synchronization of all resources (locations, nodes, allocations, nests, servers, databases, users)

get.description: Retrieves the most recent sync operation for each sync type

post.description: Synchronizes only location data from Pterodactyl panel

get.description: Retrieves paginated list of sync operation logs

parameters.description: Filter by sync type (full, locations, nodes, servers, users)
parameters.name: type

post.description: Synchronizes only node data from Pterodactyl panel
Synchronizes only server data from Pterodactyl panel

get.description: Retrieves detailed status and metadata of a specific sync operation

post.description: Synchronizes only user data from Pterodactyl panel
Dispatches a webhook event to all configured webhooks that handle the event type
